Class AndroidUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.artoolkitx.arx.arxj.AndroidUtils

  • public class AndroidUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of utility functions for performing common and useful operations specific to Android.

    • Method Detail

      • androidBuildVersion

        public static java.lang.String androidBuildVersion()
        Returns a String summarising the Android build information.
        Returns:
        The Android build information.

      • isSDCardMounted

        public static boolean isSDCardMounted()
        Returns whether or not there is an SD card mounted.
        Returns:
        true if an SD card is mounted, otherwise false.

      • getAvailableExternalMemorySize

        public static long getAvailableExternalMemorySize()
        Returns the number of bytes of external storage available.
        Returns:
        Bytes of external storage available.

      • getTotalExternalMemorySize

        public static long getTotalExternalMemorySize()
        Returns the total number of bytes of external storage.
        Returns:
        Bytes of external storage in total, or -1 if no SD card mounted.

      • formatBytes

        public static java.lang.String formatBytes(long bytes)
        Returns a formatted string representation of the number of bytes specified. The largest suitable suffix up until GB will be used, with the returned value expressed to two decimal places.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The number of bytes to be reported.
        Returns:
        The specified number of bytes, formatted as a string, in bytes, KB, MB or GB.

      • reportDisplayInformation

        public static void reportDisplayInformation(Activity activity)
        Reports to the log information about the device's display. This information includes the width and height, and density (low, medium, high).
        Parameters:
        activity - The Activity to report on.
